### National Electors Study for the 45th General Election

#### Solicitation Title

* English: National Electors Study for the 45th General Election
* French: Étude nationale auprès des électeurs pour la 45e élection générale

#### Solicitation Information

* Reference Number: CB-775-48657225

* Publication Date: October 16, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 7, 2023
*   Amendment Date: December 7, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: September 30, 2026
* Tender Status: Expired

#### Solicitation Description

Elections Canada (EC) seeks professional services from a public opinion research supplier to conduct the National Electors Study for the 45th federal general election (NES GE45). The study is a longitudinal, national survey of electors conducted before and after election day.

As the 45th Canadian federal election is scheduled for October 20, 2025, however, the contractor should be aware that an election can be held earlier. If so. EC and the contractor will modify the timeline to achieve project objectives.

The study objectives include gathering information on electors' opinions and attitudes toward election-related issues, their knowledge and use of EC services and programs, their recall and evaluation of the Voter Information Campaign, and their experience with the electoral process.

The results of the study will assist in evaluating EC’s programs and services for the electorate and inform the CEO's reports to Parliament. It will provide reliable information on electors, including subpopulations of interest to EC and identify areas for improvement in EC's various products, services, and information campaigns.

The study will be conducted from the Effective Date of the Contract until September 30, 2026. Proposals must be submitted electronically in accordance with the instructions outlined in the request for proposal document.
